div.p: RAFN Carl Christian (1795-1864), Danish archas-ologist, was born in Brahesborg, FÃ¼nen, on 16th January 1795 and died at Copenhagen on 20th October 1864. He is chiefly known in connexion Math the controversy as to the question of the discovery of America by the Norsemen. (See America, vol. i. p. 706.)
